channel.title: installation on Cocos2d-x basics
channel.description: Recent content in installation on Cocos2d-x basics

item.title: First steps
item.description: Cocos2d is an open source software framework. It can be used to build games, apps and other cross platform GUI based interactive programs. It has a lot of branches, but this tutorial series will focus on C++ and Cocos2d-x.
